mapper.sql: PKID, CTT_TYPE, PARENT_PKID, ID, NAME, SIGN_DATE, SIGN_PART_A, SIGN_PART_B, CTT_START_DATE, CTT_END_DATE, ATTACHMENT, REMARK, ARCHIVED_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, LAST_UPD_TIME, REC_VERSION, TYPE, FLOW_STATUS, FLOW_STATUS_REASON, FLOW_STATUS_REMARK
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ctt_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select uuid()
insert into ctt_info (PKID, CTT_TYPE, PARENT_PKID, ID, NAME, SIGN_DATE, SIGN_PART_A, SIGN_PART_B, CTT_START_DATE, CTT_END_DATE, ATTACHMENT, REMARK, ARCHIVED_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, LAST_UPD_TIME, REC_VERSION, TYPE, FLOW_STATUS, FLOW_STATUS_REASON, FLOW_STATUS_REMARK) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cttType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentPkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signPartA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signPartB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cttStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cttEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{flowStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{flowStatusReason,jdbcType=CHAR} )
